title: TV tonight: the final, extraordinary chapter of Ozzy Osbourne’s life
description: Behind the scenes with the Prince of Darkness as he battles illness and prepares for his final gig. Plus: confessions of a pioneering brain surgeon. Here’s what to watch this evening
content:
Ozzy Osbourne: Coming Home
9pm, BBC One
More than 20 years ago, Ozzy Osbourne and his family changed TV for ever with their fly-on-the-wall reality series. A reboot – Home to Roost – was announced back in 2022 and the cameras followed the gang again ... [3334 chars]

title: 'I had to step over my dad's body to feed the calves'
description: Farmer George Atwell is urging others to seek help after struggling with depression.
content:
A farmer who struggled with depression after his parents died within two years of each other has urged others to seek help.
George Atwell, from North Somerset, said things "got too much" after he had to step over his dad's body to go to work in 2016,... [440 chars]

title: Ozzy Osbourne: Coming Home
description: The hour-long programme will be an "uplifting" tribute to the Black Sabbath singer, producers say.
content:
It was just six weeks ago when legendary rocker Ozzy Osbourne performed in front of thousands of adoring metalheads for the final time in his home city of Birmingham.
Seventeen days later, the Black Sabbath singer and heavy metal pioneer died at his ... [353 chars]

title: Sean Connery's legacy that is helping young filmmakers
description: A foundation set up in Sir Sean's name helps give young people a start in the film industry.
content:
Sean Connery became a patron of the Edinburgh International Film Festival (EIFF) in 1996 and his first task was to bring home the UK premiere of Dragonheart, the fantasy adventure in which he voices a dragon.
For the next 14 years, he brought not jus... [687 chars]

title: Parents of Merseyside gang violence victims speak out three years on
description: Mother of Olivia Pratt-Korbel, who was killed aged nine in 2022, joins others to call for courage in tackling gun crime
content:
The mother of a girl who was killed as a result of gang violence in Liverpool has joined the families of other victims of gun crime to speak out against it.
Olivia Pratt-Korbel was nine when she was killed in her home in Dovecoat on 22 August 2022. S... [3301 chars]
